text: Yet another basic, ordinary, boring day.
You wish you were a cat.
But life isn't always sunshine and lolipops.
Wait... You see that?
A KITTYYYY!!!! AAAAAHHHH!!
What a cute kitty.
"Meow"
"Nyan, Hello there"
"Yes, I'm a talking cat."
What? A talking cat? That's an Easter miracle!
Forget about Jesus and eggs. This is way cooler.
"Mreow. Yeah I guess I'm way cooler."
"Anyway I've got some stuff to do in the cat realm."
"You know, saving the day and other stuff. And I could really use some help"
"Would you like to become a cat for a day and help me?"
"Meow? Really? I guess I judged you wrong."
"I thought you were cool. Goodnyan I guess."
You're so boring...
You've got talking cat and you didn't even care to go on adventure smh
That's it. That's your bad ending bro
And that's how your adventure starts.
"I'm Jelly by the way. What your cat name will be?"
You pick name Puffy. It's cute and round like you.
You both go into the trash bin.
It's smelly in here. You are guided by Jelly's voice.
You are going through all the trash.
Finally at the bottom of the trash bin there it is: a magic portal to the kitty world.

choices.text: Do a backflip and jump in

text: You know damn well you aren't some IShowSpeed. You can't do a backflip.
You embarassed yourself in front of the cat.
"Just jump in dude."
And so you jump normally
Damn gurl, that was some sick backflip.
Even the cat is impressed.
You jumped in normally.
Really? You are a freaking cat and you're so basic.
Boring...
And so you are placed in a different new magic cat world
You probably did something cool there...
Hey, don't ask me.
I may be your omnipresent narrator in this story.
But this omnipresent narrator is also a student.
And I'm too tired to care for the end of your story.
Use your imagination or something
This omnipresent narrator is now going to bake cookies and write raport for Parallel Processing.
The End.
